oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Postcard of Isaac A. Shoun and Will Greever on train
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Postcard with an image of Union veteran Sgt. Isaac A. Shoun (1843-1923), 13th Tenn. Cav. Regt., USA, and Will Greever on the L & N railway on their way to the St. Louis World's Fair. The back of the card reads in part, "Dear Sarahwill leave St. Louis at 8 pmhave hope you all well yours I A S." The photo was taken at Pruss' Photo Postal Studios.
